description: A framework reportedly sets out a six-week pause in the fighting to allow more hostages to be freed.
maintext: They agreed the terms of a framework for a second pause in the fighting, which US media reports said would see Hamas release any remaining elderly, women and child hostages in exchange for Palestinian prisoners during an initial period of six weeks. If that was successful, there could be another two phases of swaps, with male Israeli soldiers eventually included.
title: Hamas says it is studying proposal for new pause in Gaza fighting
